Interface ICollider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFixedGameObject, AbstractGameObject, AbstractMovableGameObject, Bird, Car, FuelCan, NPCar, OilSlick, Pylon

    public interface ICollider
    Author:
    Robert Wilk Created on 3/27/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Shape boundingShape()
      Gets the bounding shape of the collider.
      boolean collided()
      Determines if the collider has handled all of its current collisions.
      void collided(boolean collided)
      Sets the collided state.
      boolean collidesWith(ICollider other)
      Determines if the object collides with the other
      java.lang.String getCollisionKey()
      Gets the collision key of the collider.
      static java.lang.String getCollisionString(ICollider a, ICollider b)
      Constructs a collision string to be used to map the specific collision to the appropriate response.
      void handleCollision(ICollider other)
      Handles a specific collision of two colliders.
      void handleCollisions()
      Handles all collisions tracked by the collider.
      void trackCollision(ICollider other)
      Adds the collision to the list of current collisions.
